user_stories.result: I can understand traction and activity.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I can access my analytics, I must be able to see registrations started, registrations completed, activities per visit, average views per lesson, time spent in app, average tags count, total visits, total track tags.

user_stories.action: view a list of users that have created an account
user_stories.result: I can manage users.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I can access an admin portal, I must be able to view users by registration date.

user_stories.result: they don't have access any longer.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have admin rights and I created another admin,  I must be able to delete an admin.

user_stories.result: I am not the only one with access to view reporting.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I can access the admin portal and have admin rights I must be able to create new admins.

user_stories.result: I can view reporting and manage admin accounts.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I can access the admin portal and have admin rights I must be able to sign in.

user_stories.action: search my journal for a keyword or phrase
user_stories.result: I can find a relevant entry.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I can access my journal I must be able to search for a word or phrase to search throughout the entire journal.
Given I am searching I must be able to see results that include the journal entries that contain the search word(s).

user_stories.result: I can find those entries that are relevant.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have added a tag to one or more of my journal entries I must be able to see all my tags.
Given i can see all my tags I must be able to select one to filter for all entries with that tag.
Given I have selected more than one tags to filter I must be able to see the results be inclusive of only those tags.

user_stories.result: I can review what I have written as I have progressed through the course.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I can see where to access my journal I must be able to see all my journals for every lesson.
Given I can see one of my journals I must be able to see the time, date, lesson and what i wrote and any tags created.
Given I can see the journal I must be able to select to go to the actual lesson so that i can playback the lesson again.

user_stories.result: I can use the tags to filter my journal.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have entered a note into the journal of a lesson I must be able to add custom tags.
Given I have added a tag I must be see the tag associated with that journal.

user_stories.result: I can capture my thoughts and feelings on that lesson.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I started the playback of a lesson I must be able to see where i can enter notes.
Given I can see where to enter a note I must be able to type and save my notes.
Given I have entered a note I must be able to edit those notes.
Given I have entered a note I must be able to delete my notes.
Given I have entered a note I must be able to see the date and time that I entered it.

user_stories.action: receive a push notification when I complete a lesson
user_stories.result: I feel like I am making progress.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have enabled push notifications and I just completed a lesson I should receive a notification congratulating me on completing a lesson.

user_stories.action: receive a push notification when it is time to do my daily lesson
user_stories.result: I don't forget.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have enabled push notifications and have not completed all the lessons I should receive a daily notification as a reminder to do my lesson.

user_stories.action: answer 1 to 3 brief questions following a lesson
user_stories.result: my knowledge can be tested.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have completed a lesson I must be able to view one or many review questions.
Given I can view a question I must be able to answer by selecting one of the multiple choice answers.
Given I have answered a question I must be able to see if I answered it correctly.
Given I have answered one incorrectly, I should see the correct answer.
Given I want to skip the the questions I must be able to skip.

user_stories.action: indicate my mood before and after each lesson
user_stories.result: I become more aware of how the lessons are contributing to my EQ.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given i have completed a lesson I must be able to select my mood from a selection of predefined moods.
Given I want to skip I must be able to skip to continue.
Given that I am about to start a lesson then I should be able to indicate my mood too.

user_stories.result: I can free up space or make changes to what is available.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have selected up to three lessons for offline sync I must be able to clear or modify my selections.

user_stories.action: have offline access to up to 3 lessons
user_stories.result: I can make progress when I know I will not have a internet connection.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I can view all the lessons, I must be able to select up to 3 lessons to be sync to be my device for offline access.
Given I can select 3 lessons I must be able to select any previous lessons and up to 2 lessons in advance of my current lesson.

user_stories.result: i can ensure that I have fully understood the message.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have already listened to the lesson I must be able to playback the lesson at any time.

user_stories.action: see what the next lesson is
user_stories.result: I can look forward to it and plan ahead.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given i am currently viewing at a description of a lesson I must be able to see what the next lesson is.

user_stories.action: play, pause, rwd and replay an audio lesson
user_stories.result: I can learn and complete my lesson for the day.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have selected a lesson, I must be able to playback the lesson.
Given It is playing, I must be able to pause, rewind or forward the playback.
Given the lesson has completed, I must be able to replay.

user_stories.result: i know what to expect.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I can view all the lessons, I must be able to select one to view.
Given I have selected a lesson to view, I must be able to see the lesson title, duration, it's place in the overall course, and a description of what I am going to learn.

user_stories.action: see where I am in the overall course
user_stories.result: I know how much is left of the course.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have registered I must be able to see which lesson I am on currently.
Given I can see what lesson I am on, I must be able to start the lesson where I left off.

user_stories.action: see the overall course structure and time requirements
user_stories.result: I know what to expect.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have registered I must be able to view a list of all the lessons and the time duration of each.

user_stories.result: I can access the app again.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I registered with email I must be able to reset my password.
Given i have elected to reset my password I must be sent a link to a website where i can provide a new password.

user_stories.result: I am no longer signed in.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I am a registered user and i am signed in, I must be able to log out of the app.
Given i am logged out, I must be able to see where to sign in.

user_stories.result: I can access the app again.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given i am a registered user I must be able to remain signed in after I have successfully signed into the app for the first time.
Given i am a registered user, I will be limited to login on X # of devices for my account (eg. mobile, web)

user_stories.result: I can use the app.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I registered with email I must be able to enter my email and password to enter the app.

user_stories.result: I can be reminded to do the program and notified of progress.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have downloaded the app, I must be able to enable push notifications.

user_stories.result: I don't have to remember another password.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have downloaded the app I must be able to authenticate with LinkedIn.
Given I authenticate with LI successfully, I must able to proceed with other registration steps.

user_stories.result: I don't have to remember another password.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have downloaded the app I must be able to authenticate with Facebook.
Given I authenticate with FB successfully, I must able to proceed with other registration steps.

user_stories.action: provide my full name, email address and create a password
user_stories.result: I can create an account.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have download the app, I must be able to provide my full name.
Given i have provided my name, I must be able to provide my email address.
Given I have provided a valid email I must be able to define my preferred password.

user_stories.result: I can understand how it works.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I have downloaded the application I must be able to see several screens that explain how the app works.

user_stories.result: I can sign up.

acceptance_criterions.description: Given I can access the TR digital website I must be able to see where to download the app.
Given I can see where to download the app, I must be directed to iTunes.
Given I can access iTunes and I have iOS 8.x or greater I must be able to download the application.
